welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Abram, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a wide range of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and efficient terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Secondary Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Chester Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
